game.title: The Song of Simeon
game.grid: ARTNUO NO LLOFESYRLW PE IOORCA PO VA DINDLE ESSUAEI YTH EECPN NES YB K WO OUVEP MY HA TY HTNE OU IWES RPSEAV OMIIH
game.phrase: Now, Lord, I can die in peace because You have kept Your promise. I have seen with my own eyes the Savior You sent for all people!
